## FunctionNode.tokens() method

Retrieve the tokens for the current function. This is the inverse of parsing from a list of tokens.

**Signature:**

```typescript
tokens(): Array<CSSToken>;
```
**Returns:**

Array&lt;CSSToken&gt;
